name: Monsoon (DarkMoves)
description:
-Submission for Dungeon Crawler Game Jam 2023-

-Controls-
W to move forward, A and D to rotate, E to interact.
TAB for Inventory.

-Intro-

Madness has taken over the Temple of Ra, and it needs you to get rid of the Monsoon! Travel between realms while fighting monsters and solving puzzles to get through the different sections of the level! Items from powerful deities, reserved for those who can wield its power. Will you bask in the glory or get consumed by the fiend?

-Description-

Monsoon is our submission for the game jam, and it is based around the theme "duality". For that reason, we chose to play with 2 celestial bodies, the sun and the moon, and associate them with mechanics. Traveling in the realm of the sun will have you solve puzzles to unlock new paths and access the level in the realm of the moon, which is filled with fiends and monsters! The game has a small roguelike feel, but remains gentle in terms of complexity.
